channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Media Tags
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Media Tags

item.title: CVE-2021-24899|2024-08-03T19:49:13.962Z -- unknown -- media%20tags
item.description: The Media-Tags WordPress plugin through 3.2.0.2 does not sanitise and escape any of its Labels settings, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_htnl capability is disallowed.
